about_the_game:
WHAT IS THE GAME ABOUT?
Inspired by the breath and depth of classic RPG and farming games,"A Viking's Quest, the Lost Continent" is an engaging, and dynamic role playing game where you experience a beautifully hand crafted world of fantasy and adventure. You will interact with the world and its inhabitants in the quest to learn more about its life, the plants and creatures of this lost continent; and to finally uncover your very destiny in this fantasy world!

- You can learn more about the game from our web site: or from our you tube channel:


"A Viking's Quest" is designed as a 2D top-down game with RPG and exploration elements with a tint of survival features. Inspired by popular games like "StarDew valley", "Don't Starve" and the likes, it will contain some elements of survival mechanics and farming. However, our game primarily focuses on exploration and action with co-operative game-play and progression.

On top of these, there is a side scrolling ocean diving game mechanic where you may explore the beautiful hand-crafted ocean biomes of this lost fantasy continent.


CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATION

In your adventure in this lost continent, you can customize your character the way you want it and like it.


RESOURCE GATHERING
Resource gathering in the lost continent will include foraging from wild plants, gathering seeds, farming, hunting, cooking and mining for mineral ores. When you dive into the world of "A Viking's Quest", with a child-like curiosity, you can expect to find a good diversity of plant and animal life, and experience the excitement of finding rare plants or creatures, and even pets.





COMBAT
Combat is exciting and fun in the wold of "A Viking's Quest"! The melee and projectile combat is both fluid and quick. You can jump or move and attack at the same time which makes combat feels impactful and fun! You will have the opportunity to meet creatures large and small in your combat encounters. For those who are not so combat inclined, you can concentrate on the story part of the fantasy and meet up strange creatures of the dark forests! Who knows you might just befriend a faerie.


MULTIPLAYER GAMEPLAY
You can enjoy a fun CO-OP gameplay in "A Viking's Quest" either online or on the LAN and have a blast with your friends exploring the lost continent!


WEATHER SYSTEMS
The weather system is designed to work in tandem with the gameplay mechanics. There is a day and night cycle which controls the weather and how it affect the creatures of the land. There are different weather climate which applies to different region of land masses in the lost continent. Those regions are: (1) Rain Forest and swarms (2) Highlands, (3) Mountainous areas, (4) Deserts, and (5) Icy mountains.

  • Processor: Amd Ryzen 5 3600 and Above
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050 TI and above
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
